definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If a Girlworm is hit by lightning, it becomes more powerful and brings reinforcements...</comment><next><block type="entity_set_health"><value name="health"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">EntitySilverfish</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
